title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 177.1 - Services to pupils attending nonpublic schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 177.1 - Services to pupils attending nonpublic schools

State Regulations

For the purpose of obtaining services from a school
district for a student who is enrolled in a nonpublic school, pursuant to
section
3602-c
of the

Education Law, the parent, guardian or person legally having custody of such
pupil shall file a written request for such services with the trustee, board of
trustees or board of education of the school district responsible for providing
such services in accordance with section
3602-c
(2)
of the Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
177.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
